name: Munir
description:
Munir Said Thalib (8 December 1965 – 7 September 2004) born in Batu, Malang, East Java Indonesia. He was an Indonesian activist, founder of the Kontras human rights organisation. Munir was assassinated in 2004 while travelling to Utrecht University to pursue a master's degree in international law and human rights. He is one of Indonesia's most famous human rights and anti-corruption activists.
This photo was taken from Munir's commemoration in Bandung, 2013. 
100% sales from this primary market will be donated to help those who affected by the Semeru eruption in Malang and Lumajang, East Java via ACT Foundation. The proof of donation will be updated thru my twitter account @ranggarila. 

NOTE: This NFT will be available on primary market till December 12, 2021 | 9 PM GMT+7. All remaining editions will be burned on that date. Thank you so much to everyone who collect this work!
Respect and GBU!
